name: Rock Paper - What!?
description:
This isn't your grandma's Rock-Paper-Scissors!

Rock-Paper-What!? is an unhinged game of RPS that has players face off against an opponent who will choose one of three options. You have two seconds to choose an option that you think will beat their option. Winning a round gets you a point, and choosing a losing option or not choosing before the timer runs out gives the enemy one point. The first competitor to gain 3 points wins the level. The options presented get weirder and weirder, showing some weird mixtures of interactions and results. 

Controls:

Left Mouse Button - Select options/buttons.

Escape - Closes application.
